bug.author: spradeepvg
bug.summary: DeepWalk on large graphs fails to run while trying to build Huffman tree
bug.description: DeepWalk on large graph networks (150k vertices in my case) results in exception while trying to create a Huffman tree. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.RuntimeException: Cannot generate code: code length exceeds 64 bits

comments.comment: This is a data issue not bug in DeepWalk or GraphHuffman.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
